channel.title: [pi] Slayer shop Help
channel.description: So i have created a shop, added npc and everything but when i try to buy something from the shop it says it costs howmany coins, i want to make it so people can buy stuff with slayer points only.

item.title: [pi] Slayer shop Help
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

how about this…

if (c.myShopId == 21) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " PK points."); return;

I might make a slayer shop…doesnt the code go the same way as the pk points
just replace pk points with slaypoints

lol you got me started on shops now
i have a slayer points shop code that might work

if (c.myShopId == 21) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Slayer points."); return;

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Slayer shop Help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

if (c.myShopId == 71) { if (c.slPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){ c.slPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID); c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1); c.getItems().resetItems(3823); } } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have enough points to buy this item."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Slayer shop Help
item.dc:creator: @bl00dpk bl00dpk
item.description:
@bl00dpk wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:4, topic:394542”][quote author=bl00dpk link=topic=491727.msg3595824#msg3595824 date=1305066155]
i told you before i have tried and i still get error’s ill do it 1 more time and post the error’s can you give me the code agian please?
[/quote]case itemid: return valuepointforshop:[/quote]

thats not it, it will just make it points but when i buy it still wont let me use points. i need something like this. i have tried changing everything to slayer points but no luck.

public void buyFromShopPrice(int removeId, int removeSlot){ int ShopValue = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(removeId, 0, removeSlot)); ShopValue *= 1; String ShopAdd = ""; if (c.myShopId == 21) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Pk points."); return; }

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Slayer shop Help
item.dc:creator: @bl00dpk bl00dpk
item.description:
@bl00dpk wrote:

i told you before i have tried and i still get error’s ill do it 1 more time and post the error’s can you give me the code agian please? this is my code for pk points but i have tried copying and changing like to slayer points still didnt work

public void buyFromShopPrice(int removeId, int removeSlot){ int ShopValue = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(removeId, 0, removeSlot)); ShopValue *= 1; String ShopAdd = ""; if (c.myShopId == 21) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Pk points."); return; }

Read full topic
